Articles.Content:
Been playing a week, loving this game. It\'s made of so much awesome that I go to work and all I can think about is how to get my next rocket out to minimus lol.

On that subject, first successful landing of Minimus today (about 30 minutes before this post actually)

Yes, I landed the whole thing without breaking any of my parts! w00t!

The next mission for me, how to get my sun orbiters rescued and back to kerbin.. :-[

p.s. Any Kiwi\'s or Aussies out there?!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Gday Marko, welcome to the space jungle. Considering you\'ve only been playing for a week and that\'s your first landing, What a crackalackin way to start. I couldn\'t count how many munar landings i\'ve done, but to land THAT rocket with NO landing gear and so easy to topple, Man you\'ve got talent. Great effort. You can be my wingman anyday!
